title: Technical student
creator_credit: Leon Clore, Basic Films and John Fletcher
brief_description: Facilities for technological training in Britain today, particularly in relation to industry. The “sandwich” course typifying the cooperation being achieved between industry and education. Follows students through a four-year electronic engineering course alternating six months employment in the factory with six months study under a tutor at a technical college.
